column2: Being female, unmarried and almost beautiful in a court filled with young women who all seek your attention is not half bad. A particularly young wench, almost irresistible, desires the pleasure of my company...

Being female, unmarried and almost beautiful in a court filled with young men who all seek your attention is not half bad. A particularly young lad, almost irresistible, desires the pleasure of my company...
